770760.name: Dungeon of the Forgotten King
770760.description:
You wake up suddenly in a dark, unfamiliar place. You realize that you are in an open cell inside a dungeon, without your things, dressed only in rags, and no matter how hard you try, you don’t remember how you got to this dreary place. As you step out of the cell, you find a campfire that never goes out, a spectre that seems harmless and 3 mysterious altars, as well as a gate that leads to deeper parts of the dungeon, from where you perceive the shadows of hostile beings. You decide to set up camp in this room, as an unknown power blocks magic and seems to prevent enemies from approaching, and begin your journey to escape the dungeon.

DUNGEON OF THE FORGOTTEN KING is a Turn Based Single Player Roguelite RPG with graphics that mix Pixel Art with 3D. The game is mainly focused on combat, where you must defeat enemies to obtain Gold and Loot. Gold is your most valuable resource, as it is used as an offering at the Magic Altars for your character to level up, heal wounds or change classes; you can also give gold to the Wraith Merchant to receive random equipment.

  • As you level up, the enemies become more varied and powerful, and the rewards improve. The Dungeon Master may appear when your level is high enough to attract his attention.

  • Have several fights in a row to increase the probability of getting Loot and obtaining more Gold, but don't be too bold, as the enemies become more powerful the more battles you have before returning to the camp.

  • Death is permanent, so you must carefully plan when and how to spend your Gold to progress in the game and exit the Dungeon.

  • Manage your resources well, upgrade your character and defeat the Dungeon Master to find the way out!

BECOME STRONGER EVEN AFTER DEATH

Although death is final, not all is lost. You will be rewarded according to your achievements with Soul Gems, which you can use when starting a New Game to permanently improve your current and future characters.

BOSS BATTLES

As you level up, you will be given the option to battle special monsters known as Dungeon Bosses. You can choose not to fight them immediately, but you will not be able to escape the dungeon until you defeat them all.

Defeating a boss grants a power-up effect that will last for the entire run.

GET LOOT AT THE CAMP

While fighting is the main way to earn gold and loot, from time to time the camp well will activate its magic and you can earn rewards in the “Strikefirst” mini-game.

RANDOM EVENTS

Every time you go out exploring, there is a chance that a random event will occur before you leave camp, which may or may not reward you depending on the whims of fate.

MANY ENEMIES TO FACE

In DUNGEON OF THE FORGOTTEN KING, you will face different enemies who will try to eliminate you in the name of the Dungeon Master.
